snippet: Pharrell Williams says he and Hans Zimmer, musical consultants on the Oscars telecast, won't divulge details about their plans for the show, but one thing is already known: the best song nominees won't be featured.
abstract: Pharrell Williams says he and Hans Zimmer, musical consultants on the Oscars telecast, won't divulge details about their plans for the show, but one thing is already known: the best song nominees won't be featured.

headline.main: Will Neither Man Nor Muppet Sing at the Oscars?
headline.print_headline: Will Neither Man Nor Muppet Sing at Oscars?
